Package com.example.projectapp.Controller

Class DataHandler

java.lang.Object
com.example.projectapp.Controller.DataHandler
public class DataHandler extends Object
Data handler. Handles interactions with Firebase, stores attendee and organizer data, and sets up listeners for data changes.

      public void addAttendee(Attendee attendee, boolean newAttendee, AddAttendeeCallback callback)
      Adds an Attendee document to the "attendees" collection in Firebase.
      Parameters:
      attendee - The Attendee object representing the data to add.
      newAttendee - Indicates if the attendee is new or existing.
      callback - Callback to handle the result of the operation.

      value - The new value for the field.

    • addEventAttendeesListener

      public void addEventAttendeesListener(Event event, boolean getCheckedIn, EventAttendeesListenerCallback callback)
      Adds a listener for changes to the attendees of a specific event.
      Parameters:
      event - The event to listen for attendee changes.
      getCheckedIn - Whether to retrieve checked-in attendees.
      callback - Callback to handle event attendees updates.

    • addEventGeoPointsListener

      public void addEventGeoPointsListener(String eventId, EventGeoPointsListenerCallback callback)
      Adds an event listener for geopoint updates related to a specific event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The unique ID of the event to monitor.
      callback - The callback object to be invoked when geopoint updates occur.

    • addImagesListener

      public void addImagesListener(String collection, String field, android.widget.LinearLayout layout, ImagesListenerCallback callback)
      Adds a listener for changes to the images in a collection.
      Parameters:
      collection - The name of the collection to listen for image changes.
      field - The field containing image data.
      layout - The layout to update with images.
      callback - Callback to handle image updates.

    • getQrCodeEvent

      public void getQrCodeEvent(String qrData, boolean checkInto, GetQrCodeEventCallback callback)
      Retrieves the event associated with the given QR code data.
      Parameters:
      qrData - The QR code data.
      checkInto - Whether to check into the event.
      callback - Callback to handle the event retrieval result.

      public void addFcmToken()
      Gets device token for notification and adds to database

    • sendNotification

      public void sendNotification(String token, String eventName, String announcement) throws Exception
      Sends a notification to subscribers of a specific event.
      Parameters:
      token - The device token to send send the notification to
      eventName - The event for which to send the notification.
      announcement - The announcement to include in the notification.
      Throws:
      Exception - If there is an error sending the notification.
